title: Breathable
description: Defines what blocks an entity can breathe in and gives them the ability to suffocate.

fields.title: Total air supply
fields.description: Time in seconds the entity can hold its breath.

fields.title: Suffocate length
fields.description: Time in seconds between suffocation damage.

fields.title: Breathes in air
fields.description: If set, this entity can breathe in air.

fields.title: Breathes in lava
fields.description: If set, this entity can breathe in lava.

fields.title: Breathes in solids
fields.description: If set, this entity can breathe in solid blocks.

fields.title: Breathes in water
fields.description: If set, this entity can breathe in water.
If set, this entity will have visible bubbles while in water.
Time in seconds to recover breath to maximum.

fields.title: Breathable blocks
fields.description: List of blocks this entity can breathe in, in addition to the selected items above.

fields.title: Non-breathable blocks
fields.description: List of blocks this entity cannot breathe in, in addition to the selected items above.
